item.title: Gitlab + ECS + Terraform
item.description: Using **Gitlab CI/CD** to automatically build and push a new docker image on **ECR** and deploy it to **ECS**.

item.title: Lambda + Terraform + Github Actions
item.description: Building a **continuous deployment** for **Lambda** functions in a **multi-stage environment**.

item.title: Github Actions + Hugo + Terraform + S3
item.description: Creation of a static website with **Hugo**. Host it on **S3** with **CloudFront**. Use **Terraform** and **Github actions** to deploy it in a **GitOps** way.

item.title: GitOps + Terraform
item.description: Manage the **content and infrastructure** of a website in a git monorepo. **Deploy automatically** with each push.

item.title: Github Flow + Codesuite pipeline + Slack
item.description: Testing a **Node** project hosted on **github** with **CodeBuild** and **CodePipeline**. Also sending **Slack message**.

item.title: Codesuite pipeline + Terraform
item.description: Building a C++ program after each commit using **CodeCommit**, **CodeBuild** and **CodePipeline**.

item.title: Jenkins pipeline + Slack + Github release
item.description: Testing a **Node** project hosted on **github** with **Jenkins pipeline**. Also sending **Slack message** and **create github release**.

item.title: Jenkins + github
item.description: Testing a **Node** project hosted on **github** with **Jenkins**.
